resources.string: Select maximum ships to your army.

Firepower: 2
Hit points: 10
Description:
The sum of all yours destroyers is maximally as high as the sum of all enemy ships in the battle.

Firepower: 1
Hit points: 5
Description:
Every your ghost in the battle exclude one of enemy destroyers from battle until the ghost is destroyed.

Firepower: 2
Hit points: 1
Description:
Warper can move to any sector on battlefield.
You have fight hard but unfortunately the opponent is more lucky.\nYou lost
You have fight hard and well. The opponent has been destroyed.\nYou win. Congratulation
You and your opponent have fought hard and there is no winner.
